name: Import Slack channel with name matching deleted Mattermost channel
precondition:
Slack Import test files are kept in Google Drive here
You will use the above files for the tests.
It is important you have an account on the Slack team before exporting, so you can test claiming a Mattermost account imported from Slack.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Import Slack channel with name matching deleted Mattermost channel
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Create a new Mattermost team with any new channel name.
  2. Delete the channel.
  3. In Slack, create a channel with the exact same name.
  4. Export the Slack team, then import it into Mattermost. ( Please see How to Import Slack )
inline.expectedResult: • New imported channel should have a randomly generated ID as its handle (URL).

customFields.Important notes about this step: (tested archiving one of the imported channels, then importing again and checking the URL of the channel)
